name: job_workflow:ENTITY_MODEL_VAR:ENTITY_VERSION_VAR:CHAT_ID_VAR
description: Workflow for processing job entity through external data fetching, payload handling, and completion.

transitions.name: fetch_external_data
transitions.description: Fetch external data from the API

externalized_processors.name: process_fetch_external_data
externalized_processors.description: Retrieve external API data and store it in the entity

transitions.name: handle_payload
transitions.description: Process the payload with the fetched external data

externalized_processors.name: process_handle_payload
externalized_processors.description: Process the external data based on the payload details

transitions.name: set_completed
transitions.description: Mark the job entity as completed
transitions.end_state_description: Job entity is set to completed status

externalized_processors.name: process_set_completed
externalized_processors.description: Update the entity status to completed and record processed timestamp
